item.description:
6:00- Gather at the Sevens for a beer or wine. Bring a beach chair or, even better, a blanket. And food and beverages, all in a portable fashion. (disguise any alcoholic beverages in a Thermos).

6:30 Leave the Sevens for the Esplanade. Grab some territory,
and start on our BYO picnic suppers.

7:00 The Boston Landmarks Orchestra plays classical dance selections to night for its last summer weekly concert. Ravel's Bolero, for example, plus works by Gliere, Johann Strauss, Rossini, Sebelius, Smetena and others. Weather looks good, so come!

8:30ish Post concert visit to 75 Chestnut for the still hungry.

Misc I will have my cell phone on from 5:00 pm to 7:00 pm
617-571-3740.
item.how_to_find_us: I look like my picture! I will try to commandeer a table.

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: Classical Concert at the Hatch Shell
